DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial Vaccine Adherence Young Injection Drug Users
DOC.detailed_description: This research trial consist cross-sectional screening study prospective cohort study ( randomize , 2x2 factorial design ) . The primary aim study evaluate effect immunization set outreach worker support young IDU 's adherence multiple dose immunization schedule combine HAV HBV vaccine . Secondarily , study 1 ) explore feasibility remote immunization network web-based vaccine registry improve immunization coverage transient young IDU , 2 ) examine effect hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infection vaccine effectiveness , 3 ) ass behavior change vaccine attitude young IDU participate preventive vaccine trial . Subjects screen study complete interview , receive counsel test HIV , HAV , HBV HCV , return one week test result risk reduction counseling . Subjects eligible cohort study receive first immunization enrollment randomize receive subsequent vaccine either set syringe exchange program ( SEP ) public health adult immunization clinic ( AIC ) . Subjects also randomize receive vaccine reminder outreach worker outreach worker support . Each subject receive total 4 immunization 6 month . Follow visit include interview , counseling , viral testing . Study participation 12 month .
